name: SCPreferencesNotification
desc: The type of notification (used with the SCPreferencesCallBack callback).

items.name: static var commit: SCPreferencesNotification
items.desc: Indicates when new preferences have been saved.

items.name: static var apply: SCPreferencesNotification
items.desc: Indicates when a request has been made to apply the currently saved preferences to the active system configuration.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a preferences notification structure with the specified raw value.
